participant_1.background:
I've been having trouble focusing on my schoolwork because I'm so caught up in my daydreams.
I enjoy the peace and quiet of the woods when I go hiking on the weekends.
my ultimate dream , however , is to be a writer.
My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet.
i am a gymnast.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my ability to stay optimistic even when faced with challenges.
i teach at a large school.
I once sang "Hallelujah" at the top of my lungs to the police officer who pulled me over.
My home videos are a source of comfort and nostalgia, and they help me to stay positive even when things are tough.
I am going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands.

content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do for fun?
I love going to concerts, they are a great way to let loose and have fun.
That sounds like a lot of fun, I've always wanted to go to a concert but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely go to one, it's a great experience. I'm going to a concert this weekend to hear some of my favorite bands.
That sounds amazing! What bands are you going to see?
I'm going to see Coldplay and Muse. I love both of their bands.
I love Coldplay! I've seen them in concert a few times. They put on an amazing show.
I've heard that they're great live. I'm really excited to see them.
I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
